Title: Provides that before a person may receive public assistance benefits, he or she must submit to a drug test
Summary: Provides that before a person may receive public assistance benefits, he or she must submit to and pass a drug test; requires health care professionals, law enforcement agencies, and courts report certain instances of substance abuse to the commissioner of social services.
LawCode: Amd ยง131, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to people receiving public assistance
